title: Can I move apps from my work to . my personal profile on my Pixel 3a?
content: When I set my phone up, all of my apps transferred over from my old phone but most seemed to be placed (arbitrarily) under my work profile.  I'd prefer to have many in my personal profile,  Is there a way for me to move them or perhaps re-install them under my personal profile?
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3a
